text: Kim Hyon-il (born 28 December 1976) is a North Korean gymnast. He competed in three events at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:North Korean male artistic gymnasts Category:Olympic gymnasts of North Korea Category:Gymnasts at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in gymnastics Category:Gymnasts at the 1998 Asian Games Category:Gymnasts at the 2002 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for North Korea Category:Medalists at the 2002 Asian Games
title: Kim Hyon-il
